thread.section_title: Premier Inn London St Pancras Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Our 2 night stay
thread.title_full: Our 2 night stay - Review of Premier Inn London St Pancras Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: barriebrook
title: Our 2 night stay
text:
Although the stay was only a brief one we were pleased with the friendliness of the staff especially on our early arrival. We could not find fault with anything. The double room was spacious and the bed was really comfortable. We had continental breakfasts and were pleased with the choices.
When we return to London needing a hotel near the railway stations, this hotel will be our choice.
